Description:
Detects the creation of a file that has the same name as the default LiveKD kernel memory dump.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: LiveKD Kernel Memory Dump File Created
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where filepath = 'c:\windows\livekd.dmp'
